content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P8: M, 61, Retired executive, New Albany, Trump 2016/Biden 2020, swing voter]
Q: What would it take for Democrats to be competitive statewide?
"Economic message that doesn't sound condescending."
